topic: Describe a skill that was difficult for you to learn
bullets: Why you wanted to learn it
Why it was difficult for you
Explain how you felt when you finally learned it

topic: Describe a time when you helped someone
bullets: Explain how you felt after helping them

topic: Describe a place where you go to relax
bullets: Explain why this place relaxes you

topic: Describe an interesting conversation you had with a stranger
bullets: Explain why you found the conversation interesting

topic: Describe a gift you recently gave to someone
bullets: Explain how the person reacted when they received it

topic: Describe a traditional festival in your country
bullets: When and where it is celebrated
What people do during this festival
Explain why this festival is important to you or your culture

topic: Describe a time when you used a map
bullets: Explain how the map helped you (or if it was confusing)

topic: Describe a movie that made you laugh
bullets: Explain why it was so funny
